name: Big Buck Hunter Arcade
description: Big Buck Hunter will bring the arcade experience to your living room with this fast paced, addictive arcade shooter! The all new control and aim mechanics will make this a must pick up and play arcade shooter experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Window 7 Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 Processor 3.7GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 530 Graphics DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 7 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-2600 CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
